body:
In the past months, the admins have demonstrated their growing disconnect with the community.

They have made Big Tech, anti-free speech platforms (Discord) their main method of communication, using the draconian rules on those platforms as an excuse to ban those they disagree with (rather than switch to one of **MANY** available free speech chat platforms).

They have [personally taken part](https://ruqqus.com/+ShillWall/post/5emh/alleged-shill-activity-coordination-on-discord/ipl7) in clear agenda-driven shill campaigns, very thinly veiled as ["trolling"](https://ruqqus.com/+ShillWall/post/5s60/the-difference-between-trolls-and-shills/k0vo), and have burred their heads in the sand when presented very clear evidence, supported by the majority of their userbase - especially when the "trolling" continued even after said campaign was officially over.

They have decided to isolate themselves on Discord, listening to a tiny vocal minority.  

They have shown clear bias in regards to rule enforcement, doing nothing to their new discord buddies for countless harassment against users such as @milkit, but banning the plebs like @Acerphoon for telling one of the prominent RCP members (@no_chill) to kill himself (something the RCP cabal members have been doing countless times, with no consequences).

When users criticized and disagreed with site changes that were proposed by said vocal minority, they were [exiled from official admin guilds](https://ruqqus.com/+ShillWall/post/61dg/strange-behaviour-by-cap) (the **ONLY** official communication channels apart from Discord), and even those [politely requesting a reason](https://ruqqus.com/+ShillWall/post/64sd/captainmeta4-doesnt-like-being-called-out) for such exiles were themselves exiled, for exposing the admin hypocrisy.

So, since the admins clearly do not want to listen to constructive, polite criticism, it's time we told them exactly what we think about them...

#### Guildmasters

As a guildmaster, if you want to participate in this protest, do the following, in each of your guilds:  
 
 * Create a post titled "Fuck captainfaggot and kuk", or a similar variation.

 * Link it to the main post, found on +FragileRuqqusAdmin

 * Optionally, use one of the many images which can be found in the above guild.

#### Users  

Post and upvote "Admins can't sneed", and any of the above images, in admin controlled guilds (such as +Ruqqus, +changelog, etc).

#### Gather on +FragileRuqqusAdmin, and lets let the cucks know exactly how the majority of their community feels about their recent behavior

They have made Big Tech, anti-free speech platforms (Discord) their main method of communication, using the draconian rules on those platforms as an excuse to ban those they disagree with (rather than switch to one of **MANY** available free speech chat platforms).

They have [personally taken part](https://ruqqus.com/+ShillWall/post/5emh/alleged-shill-activity-coordination-on-discord/ipl7) in clear agenda-driven shill campaigns, very thinly veiled as ["trolling"](https://ruqqus.com/+ShillWall/post/5s60/the-difference-between-trolls-and-shills/k0vo), and have burred their heads in the sand when presented very clear evidence, supported by the majority of their userbase - especially when the "trolling" continued even after said campaign was officially over.

They have decided to isolate themselves on Discord, listening to a tiny vocal minority.  

They have shown clear bias in regards to rule enforcement, doing nothing to their new discord buddies for countless harassment against users such as @milkit, but banning the plebs like @Acerphoon for telling one of the prominent RCP members (@no_chill) to kill himself (something the RCP cabal members have been doing countless times, with no consequences).

When users criticized and disagreed with site changes that were proposed by said vocal minority, they were [exiled from official admin guilds](https://ruqqus.com/+ShillWall/post/61dg/strange-behaviour-by-cap) (the **ONLY** official communication channels apart from Discord), and even those [politely requesting a reason](https://ruqqus.com/+ShillWall/post/64sd/captainmeta4-doesnt-like-being-called-out) for such exiles were themselves exiled, for exposing the admin hypocrisy.

So, since the admins clearly do not want to listen to constructive, polite criticism, it's time we told them exactly what we think about them...

#### Guildmasters

As a guildmaster, if you want to participate in this protest, do the following, in each of your guilds:  
 
 * Create a post titled "Fuck captainfaggot and kuk", or a similar variation.

 * Link it to the main post, found on +FragileRuqqusAdmin

 * Optionally, use one of the many images which can be found in the above guild.

#### Users  

Post and upvote "Admins can't sneed", and any of the above images, in admin controlled guilds (such as +Ruqqus, +changelog, etc).

#### Gather on +FragileRuqqusAdmin, and lets let the cucks know exactly how the majority of their community feels about their recent behavior

![](https://i.ruqqus.com/comment/lh6s/oYMVEWoGfyI) 

![](https://i.ruqqus.com/comment/lh6y/7Os56srgrQ4)

![](https://i.ruqqus.com/comment/lh74/C-Ov9cZFMQY)

![](https://i.ruqqus.com/comment/lh7c/VNXj2Mla5UA)

![](https://i.ruqqus.com/comment/lh7g/8C1f_XmDYf8)

body:
Yes, basically they're saying: "Fellow users, don't you hate the nazis? We need to get rid of them." - If you were on reddit, you probably know that AHS had kind of the same rethoric. 

So they started a lot of drama. And people are now basically just trying to defend themselves. The people who originally started the drama are on the guild +DeuxRAMA and none of them got any consequences for starting this whole mess.

parent.body: I don't even know what you're talking about. My guess is that a bunch of butthurt leftists -- the kinds of people who use Discord, as far as I can tell -- are trying to paint ruqqus as a shitty place, since they'll always fail to defend their actual political beliefs. Attacking the messenger instead of the message, attempting to dissuade participation here. They seem to gripe about censorship on ruqqus, and yet every time I visit here I'm delighted to see content utterly shitting all over the SJW Marxist fantasy utopia. Also their posts are like 10,000-word essays about a bunch of usernames and Discord shit... I just can't imagine anyone being convinced by it.

Just what are you expecting to achieve with this? If you think the admins are terrible then why stay? If you don't think they are bad people but just need persuading, calling them faggots wouldn't be my first choice to persuade someone.

And then you  have @milkit saying "I'm going to enjoy seeing it burn to the ground and kill itself."

And that seems to be the general attitude. It's plain that the motivation is not to make things better here. It's just to smash and break things like spoiled children because you aren't getting your way. 

I like it here and I don't want the place to burn to the ground. 

If you don't think the site can be fixed, then please just leave and try not to break anything else on your way out.

In the past months, the admins have demonstrated their growing disconnect with the community.

They have made Big Tech, anti-free speech platforms (Discord) their main method of communication, using the draconian rules on those platforms as an excuse to ban those they disagree with (rather than switch to one of MANY available free speech chat platforms).

They have personally taken part in clear agenda-driven shill campaigns, very thinly veiled as "trolling", and have burred their heads in the sand when presented very clear evidence, supported by the majority of their userbase - especially when the "trolling" continued even after said campaign was officially over.

They have decided to isolate themselves on Discord, listening to a tiny vocal minority.

They have shown clear bias in regards to rule enforcement, doing nothing to their new discord buddies for countless harassment against users such as @milkit, but banning the plebs like @Acerphoon for telling one of the prominent RCP members (@no_chill) to kill himself (something the RCP cabal members have been doing countless times, with no consequences).

When users criticized and disagreed with site changes that were proposed by said vocal minority, they were exiled from official admin guilds (the ONLY official communication channels apart from Discord), and even those politely requesting a reason for such exiles were themselves exiled, for exposing the admin hypocrisy.

So, since the admins clearly do not want to listen to constructive, polite criticism, it's time we told them exactly what we think about them...

Guildmasters

As a guildmaster, if you want to participate in this protest, do the following, in each of your guilds:

  • Link it to the main post, found on +FragileRuqqusAdmin

  • Optionally, use one of the many images which can be found in the above guild.

Users

Post and upvote "Admins can't sneed", and any of the above images, in admin controlled guilds (such as +Ruqqus, +changelog, etc).

Gather on +FragileRuqqusAdmin, and lets let the cucks know exactly how the majority of their community feels about their recent behavior

parent.body:
Just what are you expecting to achieve with this? If you think the admins are terrible then why stay? If you don't think they are bad people but just need persuading, calling them faggots wouldn't be my first choice to persuade someone.

And then you  have @milkit saying "I'm going to enjoy seeing it burn to the ground and kill itself."

And that seems to be the general attitude. It's plain that the motivation is not to make things better here. It's just to smash and break things like spoiled children because you aren't getting your way. 

I like it here and I don't want the place to burn to the ground. 

If you don't think the site can be fixed, then please just leave and try not to break anything else on your way out.

body:
> In the past months, the admins have demonstrated their growing disconnect with the community.

I called it when they started giving the discord mods special treatment, and everyone thought I was crazy. And here we are. This is DefaultMods all over again. They only care about their circlejerk and have shown a growing ignorance of free speech, fairness, transparency, and privacy. They panicked when Meg leaked a discord mod chat screenshot, so much that he was removed as a mod and they *deleted the entire channel* and replaced it with a new one. I bet what they have to hide is stupid since most of my friends are discord mods and haven't seen anything strange in there, just in RCP. Probably something about rule exceptions for mods or some other minor shit which they don't want to become a controversy in case someone like me would see it.

Btw I have seen multiple instances where the admins and their discord buddies think the entire rest of their userbase is just a bunch of schizos not worth hearing. Particularly me and @stars_in_blue_major, but everyone else as a whole as well.

They have made Big Tech, anti-free speech platforms (Discord) their main method of communication, using the draconian rules on those platforms as an excuse to ban those they disagree with (rather than switch to one of **MANY** available free speech chat platforms).

They have decided to isolate themselves on Discord, listening to a tiny vocal minority.  

They have shown clear bias in regards to rule enforcement, doing nothing to their new discord buddies for countless harassment against users such as @milkit, but banning the plebs like @Acerphoon for telling one of the prominent RCP members (@no_chill) to kill himself (something the RCP cabal members have been doing countless times, with no consequences).

parent.body:
> In the past months, the admins have demonstrated their growing disconnect with the community.

I called it when they started giving the discord mods special treatment, and everyone thought I was crazy. And here we are. This is DefaultMods all over again. They only care about their circlejerk and have shown a growing ignorance of free speech, fairness, transparency, and privacy. They panicked when Meg leaked a discord mod chat screenshot, so much that he was removed as a mod and they *deleted the entire channel* and replaced it with a new one. I bet what they have to hide is stupid since most of my friends are discord mods and haven't seen anything strange in there, just in RCP. Probably something about rule exceptions for mods or some other minor shit which they don't want to become a controversy in case someone like me would see it.

Btw I have seen multiple instances where the admins and their discord buddies think the entire rest of their userbase is just a bunch of schizos not worth hearing. Particularly me and @stars_in_blue_major, but everyone else as a whole as well.

parent.body:
> In the past months, the admins have demonstrated their growing disconnect with the community.

I called it when they started giving the discord mods special treatment, and everyone thought I was crazy. And here we are. This is DefaultMods all over again. They only care about their circlejerk and have shown a growing ignorance of free speech, fairness, transparency, and privacy. They panicked when Meg leaked a discord mod chat screenshot, so much that he was removed as a mod and they *deleted the entire channel* and replaced it with a new one. I bet what they have to hide is stupid since most of my friends are discord mods and haven't seen anything strange in there, just in RCP. Probably something about rule exceptions for mods or some other minor shit which they don't want to become a controversy in case someone like me would see it.

Btw I have seen multiple instances where the admins and their discord buddies think the entire rest of their userbase is just a bunch of schizos not worth hearing. Particularly me and @stars_in_blue_major, but everyone else as a whole as well.

In the past months, the admins have demonstrated their growing disconnect with the community.

They have made Big Tech, anti-free speech platforms (Discord) their main method of communication, using the draconian rules on those platforms as an excuse to ban those they disagree with (rather than switch to one of MANY available free speech chat platforms).

They have personally taken part in clear agenda-driven shill campaigns, very thinly veiled as "trolling", and have burred their heads in the sand when presented very clear evidence, supported by the majority of their userbase - especially when the "trolling" continued even after said campaign was officially over.

They have decided to isolate themselves on Discord, listening to a tiny vocal minority.

They have shown clear bias in regards to rule enforcement, doing nothing to their new discord buddies for countless harassment against users such as @milkit, but banning the plebs like @Acerphoon for telling one of the prominent RCP members (@no_chill) to kill himself (something the RCP cabal members have been doing countless times, with no consequences).

When users criticized and disagreed with site changes that were proposed by said vocal minority, they were exiled from official admin guilds (the ONLY official communication channels apart from Discord), and even those politely requesting a reason for such exiles were themselves exiled, for exposing the admin hypocrisy.

So, since the admins clearly do not want to listen to constructive, polite criticism, it's time we told them exactly what we think about them...

Guildmasters

As a guildmaster, if you want to participate in this protest, do the following, in each of your guilds:

  • Create a post titled "Fuck captainfaggot and kuk", or a similar variation.

  • Link it to the main post, found on +FragileRuqqusAdmin

  • Optionally, use one of the many images which can be found in the above guild.

Users

Post and upvote "Admins can't sneed", and any of the above images, in admin controlled guilds (such as +Ruqqus, +changelog, etc).

Gather on +FragileRuqqusAdmin, and lets let the cucks know exactly how the majority of their community feels about their recent behavior

body:
Simply put the admins are narcissists and they are always right and everyone else is always wrong. You are not allowed to speak to them unless you are part of the elite group of users who they arbitrarily decide are good enough. If you disagree with them or call them out on anything they will ostracize you and so will their discord circlejerk. It happened exactly as I predicted months ago, as they become more and more entangled in the web of their little clique they became more distant and unconcerned with everyone else, to the point where their values (even free speech) aren't that important to them anymore as long as *they* aren't affected by it. Then they start to think of everyone outside their in-group as lesser-than. It's not easy to notice how much of a tyrant you're being unless you consider what it's like for those below you, which the admins clearly aren't doing. Every single thing they do wrong they just shrug it off with "it's not a big deal, away from us pleb". This is why discord and the admins forming cliques is so dangerous. I remembered it from reddit and knew the setup was perfect for it to happen again, and it of course did (even though the admins insisted that the 10 GM limit would just magically solve the problem). Many of us tried to suggest ruqqus at least move away from discord before it was too late but they didn't listen, because they can do no wrong. They're no longer concerned about free speech or anything, they only care about how much fun *they're* having no matter the expense to everyone else.

I'd like a mass exodus to notabug.io but unfortunately I don't think that's likely to happen. poal.co or saidit.net exist too, and xaiecon (by superleaf1995). There's also comet but it apparently has a hate speech policy, though the admins there seem more level headed than on reddit or ruqqus so far so it's decent.

post.body_html:
In the past months, the admins have demonstrated their growing disconnect with the community.

They have made Big Tech, anti-free speech platforms (Discord) their main method of communication, using the draconian rules on those platforms as an excuse to ban those they disagree with (rather than switch to one of MANY available free speech chat platforms).

They have personally taken part in clear agenda-driven shill campaigns, very thinly veiled as "trolling", and have burred their heads in the sand when presented very clear evidence, supported by the majority of their userbase - especially when the "trolling" continued even after said campaign was officially over.

They have decided to isolate themselves on Discord, listening to a tiny vocal minority.

They have shown clear bias in regards to rule enforcement, doing nothing to their new discord buddies for countless harassment against users such as @milkit, but banning the plebs like @Acerphoon for telling one of the prominent RCP members (@no_chill) to kill himself (something the RCP cabal members have been doing countless times, with no consequences).

When users criticized and disagreed with site changes that were proposed by said vocal minority, they were exiled from official admin guilds (the ONLY official communication channels apart from Discord), and even those politely requesting a reason for such exiles were themselves exiled, for exposing the admin hypocrisy.

So, since the admins clearly do not want to listen to constructive, polite criticism, it's time we told them exactly what we think about them...

Guildmasters

As a guildmaster, if you want to participate in this protest, do the following, in each of your guilds:

  • Create a post titled "Fuck captainfaggot and kuk", or a similar variation.

  • Link it to the main post, found on +FragileRuqqusAdmin

  • Optionally, use one of the many images which can be found in the above guild.

Users

Post and upvote "Admins can't sneed", and any of the above images, in admin controlled guilds (such as +Ruqqus, +changelog, etc).

Gather on +FragileRuqqusAdmin, and lets let the cucks know exactly how the majority of their community feels about their recent behavior

body:
It seems like a high on drama for laughs. I don‚Äôt really get it though.

I don‚Äôt know why the admins would become close to people who stir up drama on Ruqqus for fun. It‚Äôs not like this was the first time. Not exactly great content contribution. 

I remember early on people complained that there wasn‚Äôt enough political content. I‚Äôm mostly only interested in political/theological discussions online. I‚Äôm not interested in talking about cats. But because I wanted to help create variety I‚Äôve been helping post a lot in +cooking +justforfun +upliftingnews +wholesome 

I don‚Äôt know what‚Äôs going to happen with Ruqqus. If they actively don‚Äôt like a portion of the users that post here. I hope something good still happens for the good of the users and that preserves free speech.

parent.body:
Simply put the admins are narcissists and they are always right and everyone else is always wrong. You are not allowed to speak to them unless you are part of the elite group of users who they arbitrarily decide are good enough. If you disagree with them or call them out on anything they will ostracize you and so will their discord circlejerk. It happened exactly as I predicted months ago, as they become more and more entangled in the web of their little clique they became more distant and unconcerned with everyone else, to the point where their values (even free speech) aren't that important to them anymore as long as *they* aren't affected by it. Then they start to think of everyone outside their in-group as lesser-than. It's not easy to notice how much of a tyrant you're being unless you consider what it's like for those below you, which the admins clearly aren't doing. Every single thing they do wrong they just shrug it off with "it's not a big deal, away from us pleb". This is why discord and the admins forming cliques is so dangerous. I remembered it from reddit and knew the setup was perfect for it to happen again, and it of course did (even though the admins insisted that the 10 GM limit would just magically solve the problem). Many of us tried to suggest ruqqus at least move away from discord before it was too late but they didn't listen, because they can do no wrong. They're no longer concerned about free speech or anything, they only care about how much fun *they're* having no matter the expense to everyone else.

I'd like a mass exodus to notabug.io but unfortunately I don't think that's likely to happen. poal.co or saidit.net exist too, and xaiecon (by superleaf1995). There's also comet but it apparently has a hate speech policy, though the admins there seem more level headed than on reddit or ruqqus so far so it's decent.

They have [personally taken part](https://ruqqus.com/+ShillWall/post/5emh/alleged-shill-activity-coordination-on-discord/ipl7) in clear agenda-driven shill campaigns, very thinly veiled as ["trolling"](https://ruqqus.com/+ShillWall/post/5s60/the-difference-between-trolls-and-shills/k0vo), and have burred their heads in the sand when presented very clear evidence, supported by the majority of their userbase - especially when the "trolling" continued even after said campaign was officially over.

They have decided to isolate themselves on Discord, listening to a tiny vocal minority.  

They have shown clear bias in regards to rule enforcement, doing nothing to their new discord buddies for countless harassment against users such as @milkit, but banning the plebs like @Acerphoon for telling one of the prominent RCP members (@no_chill) to kill himself (something the RCP cabal members have been doing countless times, with no consequences).

When users criticized and disagreed with site changes that were proposed by said vocal minority, they were [exiled from official admin guilds](https://ruqqus.com/+ShillWall/post/61dg/strange-behaviour-by-cap) (the **ONLY** official communication channels apart from Discord), and even those [politely requesting a reason](https://ruqqus.com/+ShillWall/post/64sd/captainmeta4-doesnt-like-being-called-out) for such exiles were themselves exiled, for exposing the admin hypocrisy.

> I don‚Äôt know why the admins would become close to people who stir up drama on Ruqqus for fun. It‚Äôs not like this was the first time. Not exactly great content contribution.

Exactly why other admin and mod teams do it, because they only care about *their* enjoyment of the site, and if something is fun for them they will do it with little regard to the effect it has on others.

And they don't just not like a portion of the users, they don't like almost all of them. I saw several users say it in discord and also an admin who DM'd me, and they said that their entire userbase outside the minority who is in their discord groups is all schizos. Literally.

And they don't just not like a portion of the users, they don't like almost all of them. I saw several users say it in discord and also an admin who DM'd me, and they said that their entire userbase outside the minority who is in their discord groups is all schizos. Literally.

post.body:
In the past months, the admins have demonstrated their growing disconnect with the community.

They have made Big Tech, anti-free speech platforms (Discord) their main method of communication, using the draconian rules on those platforms as an excuse to ban those they disagree with (rather than switch to one of **MANY** available free speech chat platforms).

They have [personally taken part](https://ruqqus.com/+ShillWall/post/5emh/alleged-shill-activity-coordination-on-discord/ipl7) in clear agenda-driven shill campaigns, very thinly veiled as ["trolling"](https://ruqqus.com/+ShillWall/post/5s60/the-difference-between-trolls-and-shills/k0vo), and have burred their heads in the sand when presented very clear evidence, supported by the majority of their userbase - especially when the "trolling" continued even after said campaign was officially over.

They have decided to isolate themselves on Discord, listening to a tiny vocal minority.  

They have shown clear bias in regards to rule enforcement, doing nothing to their new discord buddies for countless harassment against users such as @milkit, but banning the plebs like @Acerphoon for telling one of the prominent RCP members (@no_chill) to kill himself (something the RCP cabal members have been doing countless times, with no consequences).

When users criticized and disagreed with site changes that were proposed by said vocal minority, they were [exiled from official admin guilds](https://ruqqus.com/+ShillWall/post/61dg/strange-behaviour-by-cap) (the **ONLY** official communication channels apart from Discord), and even those [politely requesting a reason](https://ruqqus.com/+ShillWall/post/64sd/captainmeta4-doesnt-like-being-called-out) for such exiles were themselves exiled, for exposing the admin hypocrisy.

So, since the admins clearly do not want to listen to constructive, polite criticism, it's time we told them exactly what we think about them...

#### Guildmasters

As a guildmaster, if you want to participate in this protest, do the following, in each of your guilds:  
 
 * Create a post titled "Fuck captainfaggot and kuk", or a similar variation.

 * Link it to the main post, found on +FragileRuqqusAdmin

 * Optionally, use one of the many images which can be found in the above guild.

#### Users  

Post and upvote "Admins can't sneed", and any of the above images, in admin controlled guilds (such as +Ruqqus, +changelog, etc).

#### Gather on +FragileRuqqusAdmin, and lets let the cucks know exactly how the majority of their community feels about their recent behavior

Exactly why other admin and mod teams do it, because they only care about *their* enjoyment of the site, and if something is fun for them they will do it with little regard to the effect it has on others.

And they don't just not like a portion of the users, they don't like almost all of them. I saw several users say it in discord and also an admin who DM'd me, and they said that their entire userbase outside the minority who is in their discord groups is all schizos. Literally.

body:
I had defended and still do defend that those guilds be forcibly categorised, but **all categories should be turned on by default** as to allow people who want to remove such content from their feeds to be able to do so but without having things hidden by default. As long as some categories are hidden by default, forced categorisation amounts to censorship and can be equated to Reddit quarantines.

I'm still not sure how this is going to turn out. As has been pointed out, this is still a novel feature and could end up being changed... I have always been concerned with how much attention is given to the shithole that is the Discord server, which isn't representative of the Ruqqus userbase... these recent developments have exacerbated this concern of mine. I like kek and arkitekt, and don't dislike captainmeta4. I don't think it's as bad as you think it is, I don't think they're trying to implement censorship, but we'll see.

The +deuxrama gang is trolling people, they don't have any real influence. No more than any other faggot on the Discord server. Their troll activity used to be more refined... it's really been dog shit these past few days, it's like they're LARPing instead of just trolling, like they've fallen for their own propaganda.

Carpathianflorist used to be, as the kids say, "mad based". His trolling really went to shit during the election season. There was a mild recovery since then, but it turned to shit again, and I fear what happened is that he fell for his own propaganda.

They have personally taken part in clear agenda-driven shill campaigns, very thinly veiled as "trolling", and have burred their heads in the sand when presented very clear evidence, supported by the majority of their userbase - especially when the "trolling" continued even after said campaign was officially over.

They have decided to isolate themselves on Discord, listening to a tiny vocal minority.

They have shown clear bias in regards to rule enforcement, doing nothing to their new discord buddies for countless harassment against users such as @milkit, but banning the plebs like @Acerphoon for telling one of the prominent RCP members (@no_chill) to kill himself (something the RCP cabal members have been doing countless times, with no consequences).

When users criticized and disagreed with site changes that were proposed by said vocal minority, they were exiled from official admin guilds (the ONLY official communication channels apart from Discord), and even those politely requesting a reason for such exiles were themselves exiled, for exposing the admin hypocrisy.

So, since the admins clearly do not want to listen to constructive, polite criticism, it's time we told them exactly what we think about them...

Guildmasters

As a guildmaster, if you want to participate in this protest, do the following, in each of your guilds:

  • Create a post titled "Fuck captainfaggot and kuk", or a similar variation.

  • Link it to the main post, found on +FragileRuqqusAdmin

  • Optionally, use one of the many images which can be found in the above guild.

Users

Post and upvote "Admins can't sneed", and any of the above images, in admin controlled guilds (such as +Ruqqus, +changelog, etc).

Gather on +FragileRuqqusAdmin, and lets let the cucks know exactly how the majority of their community feels about their recent behavior

parent.body:
I had defended and still do defend that those guilds be forcibly categorised, but **all categories should be turned on by default** as to allow people who want to remove such content from their feeds to be able to do so but without having things hidden by default. As long as some categories are hidden by default, forced categorisation amounts to censorship and can be equated to Reddit quarantines.

I'm still not sure how this is going to turn out. As has been pointed out, this is still a novel feature and could end up being changed... I have always been concerned with how much attention is given to the shithole that is the Discord server, which isn't representative of the Ruqqus userbase... these recent developments have exacerbated this concern of mine. I like kek and arkitekt, and don't dislike captainmeta4. I don't think it's as bad as you think it is, I don't think they're trying to implement censorship, but we'll see.

The +deuxrama gang is trolling people, they don't have any real influence. No more than any other faggot on the Discord server. Their troll activity used to be more refined... it's really been dog shit these past few days, it's like they're LARPing instead of just trolling, like they've fallen for their own propaganda.

Carpathianflorist used to be, as the kids say, "mad based". His trolling really went to shit during the election season. There was a mild recovery since then, but it turned to shit again, and I fear what happened is that he fell for his own propaganda.
parent.body_html:
I had defended and still do defend that those guilds be forcibly categorised, but all categories should be turned on by default as to allow people who want to remove such content from their feeds to be able to do so but without having things hidden by default. As long as some categories are hidden by default, forced categorisation amounts to censorship and can be equated to Reddit quarantines.

I'm still not sure how this is going to turn out. As has been pointed out, this is still a novel feature and could end up being changed... I have always been concerned with how much attention is given to the shithole that is the Discord server, which isn't representative of the Ruqqus userbase... these recent developments have exacerbated this concern of mine. The +DeuxRAMA gang is trolling people, they don't have any real influence. No more than any other faggot on the Discord server. Their troll activity used to be more refined... it's really been dog shit these past few days, it's like they're LARPing instead of just trolling, like they've fallen for their own propaganda.

post.body:
In the past months, the admins have demonstrated their growing disconnect with the community.

They have made Big Tech, anti-free speech platforms (Discord) their main method of communication, using the draconian rules on those platforms as an excuse to ban those they disagree with (rather than switch to one of **MANY** available free speech chat platforms).

They have [personally taken part](https://ruqqus.com/+ShillWall/post/5emh/alleged-shill-activity-coordination-on-discord/ipl7) in clear agenda-driven shill campaigns, very thinly veiled as ["trolling"](https://ruqqus.com/+ShillWall/post/5s60/the-difference-between-trolls-and-shills/k0vo), and have burred their heads in the sand when presented very clear evidence, supported by the majority of their userbase - especially when the "trolling" continued even after said campaign was officially over.

They have decided to isolate themselves on Discord, listening to a tiny vocal minority.  

They have shown clear bias in regards to rule enforcement, doing nothing to their new discord buddies for countless harassment against users such as @milkit, but banning the plebs like @Acerphoon for telling one of the prominent RCP members (@no_chill) to kill himself (something the RCP cabal members have been doing countless times, with no consequences).

When users criticized and disagreed with site changes that were proposed by said vocal minority, they were [exiled from official admin guilds](https://ruqqus.com/+ShillWall/post/61dg/strange-behaviour-by-cap) (the **ONLY** official communication channels apart from Discord), and even those [politely requesting a reason](https://ruqqus.com/+ShillWall/post/64sd/captainmeta4-doesnt-like-being-called-out) for such exiles were themselves exiled, for exposing the admin hypocrisy.

So, since the admins clearly do not want to listen to constructive, polite criticism, it's time we told them exactly what we think about them...

#### Guildmasters

As a guildmaster, if you want to participate in this protest, do the following, in each of your guilds:

They have made Big Tech, anti-free speech platforms (Discord) their main method of communication, using the draconian rules on those platforms as an excuse to ban those they disagree with (rather than switch to one of MANY available free speech chat platforms).

They have personally taken part in clear agenda-driven shill campaigns, very thinly veiled as "trolling", and have burred their heads in the sand when presented very clear evidence, supported by the majority of their userbase - especially when the "trolling" continued even after said campaign was officially over.

They have decided to isolate themselves on Discord, listening to a tiny vocal minority.

They have shown clear bias in regards to rule enforcement, doing nothing to their new discord buddies for countless harassment against users such as @milkit, but banning the plebs like @Acerphoon for telling one of the prominent RCP members (@no_chill) to kill himself (something the RCP cabal members have been doing countless times, with no consequences).

When users criticized and disagreed with site changes that were proposed by said vocal minority, they were exiled from official admin guilds (the ONLY official communication channels apart from Discord), and even those politely requesting a reason for such exiles were themselves exiled, for exposing the admin hypocrisy.

So, since the admins clearly do not want to listen to constructive, polite criticism, it's time we told them exactly what we think about them...

Guildmasters

As a guildmaster, if you want to participate in this protest, do the following, in each of your guilds:

  • Create a post titled "Fuck captainfaggot and kuk", or a similar variation.

  • Link it to the main post, found on +FragileRuqqusAdmin

  • Optionally, use one of the many images which can be found in the above guild.

Users

Post and upvote "Admins can't sneed", and any of the above images, in admin controlled guilds (such as +Ruqqus, +changelog, etc).

Gather on +FragileRuqqusAdmin, and lets let the cucks know exactly how the majority of their community feels about their recent behavior

parent.body:
I had defended and still do defend that those guilds be forcibly categorised, but **all categories should be turned on by default** as to allow people who want to remove such content from their feeds to be able to do so but without having things hidden by default. As long as some categories are hidden by default, forced categorisation amounts to censorship and can be equated to Reddit quarantines.

I'm still not sure how this is going to turn out. As has been pointed out, this is still a novel feature and could end up being changed... I have always been concerned with how much attention is given to the shithole that is the Discord server, which isn't representative of the Ruqqus userbase... these recent developments have exacerbated this concern of mine. I like kek and arkitekt, and don't dislike captainmeta4. I don't think it's as bad as you think it is, I don't think they're trying to implement censorship, but we'll see.

The +deuxrama gang is trolling people, they don't have any real influence. No more than any other faggot on the Discord server. Their troll activity used to be more refined... it's really been dog shit these past few days, it's like they're LARPing instead of just trolling, like they've fallen for their own propaganda.

Carpathianflorist used to be, as the kids say, "mad based". His trolling really went to shit during the election season. There was a mild recovery since then, but it turned to shit again, and I fear what happened is that he fell for his own propaganda.

They have decided to isolate themselves on Discord, listening to a tiny vocal minority.

They have made Big Tech, anti-free speech platforms (Discord) their main method of communication, using the draconian rules on those platforms as an excuse to ban those they disagree with (rather than switch to one of **MANY** available free speech chat platforms).

They have [personally taken part](https://ruqqus.com/+ShillWall/post/5emh/alleged-shill-activity-coordination-on-discord/ipl7) in clear agenda-driven shill campaigns, very thinly veiled as ["trolling"](https://ruqqus.com/+ShillWall/post/5s60/the-difference-between-trolls-and-shills/k0vo), and have burred their heads in the sand when presented very clear evidence, supported by the majority of their userbase - especially when the "trolling" continued even after said campaign was officially over.

They have decided to isolate themselves on Discord, listening to a tiny vocal minority.  

They have shown clear bias in regards to rule enforcement, doing nothing to their new discord buddies for countless harassment against users such as @milkit, but banning the plebs like @Acerphoon for telling one of the prominent RCP members (@no_chill) to kill himself (something the RCP cabal members have been doing countless times, with no consequences).

When users criticized and disagreed with site changes that were proposed by said vocal minority, they were [exiled from official admin guilds](https://ruqqus.com/+ShillWall/post/61dg/strange-behaviour-by-cap) (the **ONLY** official communication channels apart from Discord), and even those [politely requesting a reason](https://ruqqus.com/+ShillWall/post/64sd/captainmeta4-doesnt-like-being-called-out) for such exiles were themselves exiled, for exposing the admin hypocrisy.

So, since the admins clearly do not want to listen to constructive, polite criticism, it's time we told them exactly what we think about them...

#### Guildmasters

As a guildmaster, if you want to participate in this protest, do the following, in each of your guilds:  
 
 * Create a post titled "Fuck captainfaggot and kuk", or a similar variation.

 * Link it to the main post, found on +FragileRuqqusAdmin

 * Optionally, use one of the many images which can be found in the above guild.

#### Users  

Post and upvote "Admins can't sneed", and any of the above images, in admin controlled guilds (such as +Ruqqus, +changelog, etc).

#### Gather on +FragileRuqqusAdmin, and lets let the cucks know exactly how the majority of their community feels about their recent behavior

![](https://i.ruqqus.com/comment/lh6y/7Os56srgrQ4)

![](https://i.ruqqus.com/comment/lh74/C-Ov9cZFMQY)

![](https://i.ruqqus.com/comment/lh7c/VNXj2Mla5UA)

![](https://i.ruqqus.com/comment/lh7g/8C1f_XmDYf8)

They have made Big Tech, anti-free speech platforms (Discord) their main method of communication, using the draconian rules on those platforms as an excuse to ban those they disagree with (rather than switch to one of MANY available free speech chat platforms).

They have personally taken part in clear agenda-driven shill campaigns, very thinly veiled as "trolling", and have burred their heads in the sand when presented very clear evidence, supported by the majority of their userbase - especially when the "trolling" continued even after said campaign was officially over.

They have decided to isolate themselves on Discord, listening to a tiny vocal minority.

They have shown clear bias in regards to rule enforcement, doing nothing to their new discord buddies for countless harassment against users such as @milkit, but banning the plebs like @Acerphoon for telling one of the prominent RCP members (@no_chill) to kill himself (something the RCP cabal members have been doing countless times, with no consequences).

When users criticized and disagreed with site changes that were proposed by said vocal minority, they were exiled from official admin guilds (the ONLY official communication channels apart from Discord), and even those politely requesting a reason for such exiles were themselves exiled, for exposing the admin hypocrisy.

So, since the admins clearly do not want to listen to constructive, polite criticism, it's time we told them exactly what we think about them...

Guildmasters

As a guildmaster, if you want to participate in this protest, do the following, in each of your guilds:

  • Create a post titled "Fuck captainfaggot and kuk", or a similar variation.

  • Link it to the main post, found on +FragileRuqqusAdmin

  • Optionally, use one of the many images which can be found in the above guild.

Users

Post and upvote "Admins can't sneed", and any of the above images, in admin controlled guilds (such as +Ruqqus, +changelog, etc).

Gather on +FragileRuqqusAdmin, and lets let the cucks know exactly how the majority of their community feels about their recent behavior
post.title: Operation Can't Sneed (Fuck You Admins)

They have [personally taken part](https://ruqqus.com/+ShillWall/post/5emh/alleged-shill-activity-coordination-on-discord/ipl7) in clear agenda-driven shill campaigns, very thinly veiled as ["trolling"](https://ruqqus.com/+ShillWall/post/5s60/the-difference-between-trolls-and-shills/k0vo), and have burred their heads in the sand when presented very clear evidence, supported by the majority of their userbase - especially when the "trolling" continued even after said campaign was officially over.

They have decided to isolate themselves on Discord, listening to a tiny vocal minority.  

They have shown clear bias in regards to rule enforcement, doing nothing to their new discord buddies for countless harassment against users such as @milkit, but banning the plebs like @Acerphoon for telling one of the prominent RCP members (@no_chill) to kill himself (something the RCP cabal members have been doing countless times, with no consequences).

When users criticized and disagreed with site changes that were proposed by said vocal minority, they were [exiled from official admin guilds](https://ruqqus.com/+ShillWall/post/61dg/strange-behaviour-by-cap) (the **ONLY** official communication channels apart from Discord), and even those [politely requesting a reason](https://ruqqus.com/+ShillWall/post/64sd/captainmeta4-doesnt-like-being-called-out) for such exiles were themselves exiled, for exposing the admin hypocrisy.

So, since the admins clearly do not want to listen to constructive, polite criticism, it's time we told them exactly what we think about them...
